website_summaries.verdict: A mild resurfacing toner for combination and dry skin types that contains glycolic acid and alpha hydroxy acid.
pros: The acids work to promote skin cell turnover for a less acne-prone and more radiant complexion
Softens the appearance of fine lines
Helps correct uneven texture and complexion
Also contains aloe vera to soothe the skin
cons: Some reviewers found it too drying, as it does contain alcohol

customer_reviews.title: Great for black heads

This is also good if you are looking for an exfoliate. This helps break apart dead skin cells. My family and I have been using this product for quite some time now and continue to repurchase.

customer_reviews.author: Hailey Appel

customer_reviews.title: Not Sealed- Could be FAKE
customer_reviews.text: I was sent the bottle in a plastic bag, no original packaging. I unscrewed the lid and it had no seal. The bottle was overly filled as well, which means someone filled it up with something. I have no idea if I can trust It to put on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My bottle is not alcohol-free
customer_reviews.text: This product is working great so far, BUT it’s advertised as alcohol-free and the bottle I received is not??? It includes benzyl alcohol. The list of ingredients on my bottle are completely different than the pictures shown. I kinda want to stop using it now that I read the ingredients...
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend who gets blackheads around his nose. Haven’t seen much of a difference in the blackhead but he says it really gets his skin clean. He has sensitive skin but this didn’t irritate him - he’s been using it twice and week and follows with sunscreen the next morning
customer_reviews.author: Aditya Kishen

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! I use it at any point in the day for a quick refresh, but also at night before I go to bed. I have extremely sensitive skin and I haven't had any issues with this.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Clears Dark Spots!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I’ve been using this for 2 years and it’s just the best. It has made my dark spots lighter, makes my skin softer and just brighter. This is perfect for all skin types! I have medium brown skin town and it’s perfect for me :)
customer_reviews.author: chanel levius

customer_reviews.title: Simple, but effective ingredients. Doesn't strip the skin at all
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't strip my skin, even with twice daily use. My collagen masks have been working much better since I added toner before application.
customer_reviews.author: Megan A.

customer_reviews.title: Works but fragranced
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and think it works but it does have some fragrance so it’s not the best for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: If you're an acne prone type of person along with sensitive and dry skin, it might not be a great idea to buy this product, it will most likely cause redness. The toner does work and it is approved by most dermatologists, BUT IT WILL NOT WORK if you don't have a somewhat clean skin already.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Minier

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: It's not a good moisturizer but it helps remove makeup dirt, oil that's left after washing or exfoliating
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Works great for acne. Apply with cotton ball.
customer_reviews.text: I use twice a day with a cotton ball and I can see a noticible improvement after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: dmindz72

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for hubby
customer_reviews.text: The dermatologist recommended this but it was a bit too acidic for his needs. Maybe it will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: TN MT Mama

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best toner I've ever used. I was concerned using a Glycolic Acid daily would dry out my skin and it doesn't at all. Love it and will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I can really feel the difference! I love this toner. It isn't the cheapest, but not the most expensive either. I feel like it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: JollyBarker

customer_reviews.title: Like this very much.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not harsh at all. My semi-sensitive skin loves it. Good for skin texture and clearing of pores.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I have been using it for about 2 weeks now and have definitely seen results. My face is already feeling clear and smooth and my acne scars are definitely starting to blur. I have hyperpigmented scars and starting to use glycolic acids to help resurface my skin. This is definitely one to start with for beginners!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy C Perla

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective
customer_reviews.text: Stings a bit, but it's a minty kind of sting. As a toner it's great for using in a 5-step care routine. It helps lighten the appearance of some scarring and dark spots. A gentle exfoliant.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Get it ASAP
customer_reviews.text: Best product ever Only thing is the tap I don’t like how it works but it’s good (I use with cotton)
customer_reviews.author: Hanzel Esteban Castro Solano

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: This is the first toner I've ever used but I think it's pretty good! It makes you feel fresh and it smells really nice
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: My skin had been feeling dull and flaky
customer_reviews.text: I had used this before but not consistently. My skin had been feeling dull and flaky. This time around I have been using it every night and I am very pleased with the results. I have sensitive skin that is often red. This toner seems to brighten it and calm it. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: VT gal

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: I got this product to try to replace my Pixi Glycolic Acid toner but it's not as good as their brand. It does it's job and helps with my oil production but I definitely prefer my other brand over this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Morejon

customer_reviews.title: It works for sure
customer_reviews.text: Highly effective with fine lines even though I'm pleased I want a moturizer to remove dark circles too
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Skin worsened
customer_reviews.text: My skin worsened after the first couple of uses. I was breaking out more, and my skin was drier than ever.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Give It A Try!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this toner for about 3 weeks now, and I am pleased at 4 things: (1) it doesn't burn my sensitive skin (anything with the word "acid" in it gives me pause), (2) it leaves my skin feeling refreshed and dewy, (3) I am noticing a difference in my skin's tone and texture already, and (4) it smells great!
customer_reviews.author: N.W.

customer_reviews.title: Great face toner
customer_reviews.text: I’ve repurchased this toner multiples times! It really makes a huge difference in my skin, decreases textures and leaves it feeling clean.

product_meta.description:
Size:8 Fl OzHelp soften the look of fine lines and wrinkles while smoothing the skin with the anti-aging ingredients found in our Glycolic Acid-based toner. Glycolic Acid and the Alpha Hydroxy Acid found naturally in Papaya Extract help accelerate skin cell turnover for younger-looking skin. Aloe Vera is added to soothe your complexion. Alcohol free.

BRAND STORY
Simple, gentle, effective skin care is our philosophy—and for that we’ve earned the reputation of being an editor favorite and celebrity go-to worldwide. MARIO BADESCU SKIN CARE IS SKIN CARE FOR ALL.
